# Release Notes Template

Use this template for all upcoming releases.

## Title

`vX.Y.Z — Short descriptive summary`

## Notes

```md
## Highlights

Brief summary of the release impact and scope.

## Features

- [area] Describe new capability.
- [area] Describe another addition.

## Fixes

- [area] Describe bug fix and user impact.
- [area] Describe another fix.

## Docs

- [area] Describe docs updates (guides/examples/api docs).

## Breaking

- None.
```

---

## Draft for `v0.0.2`

### Title

`v0.0.2 — Stabilization and workflow improvements`

### Notes

```md
## Highlights

Stabilization release focused on workflow quality, release hygiene, and project maintainability.

## Features

- [storybook] Expanded Storybook playground coverage for core components.
- [styles] Improved first-party style package organization and distribution setup.

## Fixes

- [tooling] Corrected ignore rules for generated Storybook and Vite build artifacts.
- [repo] Improved repository/release readiness for consistent GitHub publishing.

## Docs

- [repo] Clarified project structure and testing context across examples and test workspaces.

## Breaking

- None.
```
